Exposes.Name: HGX_GPU 0 TEMP_1
Exposes.Description: Thermal Limit(TLIMIT) Temperature is the distance in deg C from the GPU temperature to the first throttle limit.

Exposes.Name: XIDEventSetting
Exposes.Resolution: Regarding XID documentation and further actions please refer to XID and sXID Catalog for NVIDIA Data Center Products (NVOnline: 1115699)

Exposes.Name: ResetRequiredEventSetting
Exposes.Resolution: Reset the GPU or power cycle the Baseboard.
